title: Is this a laptop worth buying for league?
body:
Hi so I am starting uni and need a laptop to study / play league. I just want a laptop that would run league at med - high specs at 60 fps. Would this laptop be good enough for this and is the price worth it for a laptop with the given specs?  If not what would be a good laptop? Not willing to break $1100.
http://www.ebay.com.au/itm/NEW-ASUS-F-X555LJ-i7-5500U-8GB-1TB-15-6-GeForce-GT920-Gaming-Laptop-Windows-10-/171953537734?hash=item28093ac2c6:g:hMsAAOSw14xWMbhB

replies.body:
While I don't personally recommend a laptop for gaming, you should have no issues running League of Legends at a stable framerate with that machine.

For future reference you can do a quick google search for "GPU MODEL benchmark" replace GPU model with the make of GPU you're looking at to find performance benchmarks as a general idea of how well that GPU will perform in most modern games.

See a benchmark of the GeForce 920m [here](http://laptopmedia.com/highlights/nvidia-geforce-920m-benchmarks-and-gaming-tests/)
